mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, NOTICE_YN, READ_CNT, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_YN, REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, NOTICE_YN, CONTENTS, USER_ID, READ_CNT, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.NOTICE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM NOTICE A), #{title}, #{noticeYn}, #{contents}, #{userId}, 0, #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, NOTICE_YN, READ_CNT, USER_ID, CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, NOTICE_YN = #{noticeYn}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_ID = #{userId}, CHG_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
